subject: New York City Marathon
Running
Hurricane Sandy (2012)
lead_paragraph: The Manhattan borough president added his name to those opposed to running the marathon on Sunday, as did Bill de Blasio, the public advocate, who had supported the race earlier this week.
snippet: The Manhattan borough president added his name to those opposed to running the marathon on Sunday, as did Bill de Blasio, the public advocate, who had supported the race earlier this week.
